channel.title: Your Favorite part in Half Life & it's episodes?
channel.description: What are your favorite parts in the Half Life Sega? Mine is when you fight the Hunters for the first time.

item.title: Your Favorite part in Half Life & it's episodes?
item.dc:creator: Vampire95
item.description:
When Alyx asked DOG if he did the math (when he is suposed to throw the car in Ep.1) and when DOG sj´haked his head, no he did not do the math, you panic but you get in the car anyway. :freeman:

item.description:
I dont really have a favorite part. I’ve played half life since the first day it was released. I just love it all. Gordon is my hero. HALF LIFE FOREVER!

item.source: Your Favorite part in Half Life & it's episodes?

item.title: Your Favorite part in Half Life & it's episodes?
item.dc:creator: Naked_Shooter
item.description:
The free stalker-holder-thing ride(s) inside the citadel. It was a great way to build up to the blue gravity gun, and the ending sequence of HL2, and I got to see those big things that you never really get to fight…

item.title: Your Favorite part in Half Life & it's episodes?
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
Randombine:

I meant as in The entire story of Half life. (Half life, Half life 2, EP1, EP2)

So you meant saga? Its too difficult to choose a favorite moment. Half-Life’s quality as a whole is what makes it a good game.

Read full topic
item.source: Your Favorite part in Half Life & it's episodes?

item.title: Your Favorite part in Half Life & it's episodes?
item.dc:creator: d0z_n0X
item.description:
Half Life 2: Episode Two, when the hunter jumps down behind Alyx and stabs her in the back. I remember saying something like ‘‘NOO, i couldn’t do SHIT to save her’’.

Also, it happened without any music, and it was so sudden.

Read full topic
item.source: Your Favorite part in Half Life & it's episodes?

item.title: Your Favorite part in Half Life & it's episodes?
item.dc:creator: SkyBlue
item.description:
My favourite part is during Episode 1 (I think) when you and Alyx reach a safehouse and Dr Kleiner is talking about reproduction being possible again (after the destruction of the Citadel), and the citizens’ responses to it!

Read full topic
item.source: Your Favorite part in Half Life & it's episodes?

item.title: Your Favorite part in Half Life & it's episodes?
item.dc:creator: GFreeman515
item.description:
Thecromewriter:

What is Half Life?
What is the average half life of Plutonium?
Is Half Life good?
How should I believe you?

A game made in 1998 by VALVe corp.

I ment the game.

Thats your choice.I think the game was pretty cool!

I’ve played every single game of Half-Life series,and i read the wikia… ALOT
And I watched the All your history are belong to us.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8gxFaGKHbEY

Pro-Tip: PM me next time insted of asking in a thread.

Read full topic
item.source: Your Favorite part in Half Life & it's episodes?

item.title: Your Favorite part in Half Life & it's episodes?
item.dc:creator: Power_Dust
item.description:
One of my most favorite parts in all Half-Life epsiodes is in Half-Life 2: Episode One at the beginning of “Urban flight” when you get out of the garage and see the citadel in the middle of the destroyed city. In that moment there’s no great action but silence with Dr. Kleiner speaking, just awesome that place. I also like the launch of the rocket in Half-Life with this soundtrack.

Read full topic
